text:
加密型帳單輸入密碼為『身分證號』(第一碼英文字母須大寫)，如為公司戶請輸入『統一編號』
；外籍人士請輸入『統一證號』(英文字母須大寫)。
為讓您的電子帳單收件更順利，建議將「台新銀行寄件人信箱[redacted_email]」加入您的通訊錄中或設定為非垃圾信件。 此為信箱為系統直接發送請勿回覆，若有疑問請與客服聯繫。
trans:
The password for encrypted billing is "Identification Card Number" (the first English letter must be capitalized). If it is a corporate account, please enter the "Government Uniform Invoice Number"
; foreigners please enter "Uniform Identification Number" (English letters should be capitalized)
To ensure your e-bill receipt, it is recommended to add the "Taishin Bank sender's mailbox [redacted_email]" to your address book or set it as non-spam. This is an email sent directly by the system. Please do not reply. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
